Plot: A documentary portrait of a one-room school in rural France, where the students (ranging in age from 4 to 11) are educated by a single dedicated teacher.
Title: To Be and to Have
Actors: Georges Lopez, Alizé, Axel Thouvenin, Guillaume
tomatoConsensus: A small, sensitive, and moving portrait of a teacher and his students.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 8 wins & 6 nominations.
